name: ABPersonViewController
desc: The ABPersonViewController class (whose instances are known as person view controllers) implements the view used to display a person record (ABPersonRef).DeprecatedUse init(for:) instead.

items.name: protocol ABPersonViewControllerDelegate
items.desc: The ABPersonViewControllerDelegate protocol declares the interface that must be implemented by ABPersonViewController delegates.

items.name: var displayedPerson: ABRecord
items.desc: The person displayed by the person view.

items.name: var displayedProperties: [NSNumber]?
items.desc: Identifies the set of properties (such as name or telephone number) of displayedPerson the receiver displays.

items.name: var shouldShowLinkedPeople: Bool
items.desc: Indicates whether the person view should display data from person records that are linked with the person record being displayed.

items.name: var addressBook: ABAddressBook?
items.desc: Optional. The address book from which to obtain the contact to display.

items.name: var allowsActions: Bool
items.desc: Specifies whether the to display buttons for actions such as sending a text message or initiating a FaceTime call.

items.name: var allowsEditing: Bool
items.desc: Specifies whether the user can edit the personâ€™s information.

items.name: func setHighlightedItemForProperty(ABPropertyID, withIdentifier: ABMultiValueIdentifier)
items.desc: Specifies whether to highlight a particular property of the displayed person.
